titleStmt.title: Ars moriendi. Here begynneth a lytell treatyse shortlye compyled, and called Ars moriendi/that is to saye the crafte to dye, for the helth of manes soule.
Ars moriendi. English.

notesStmt.note: Date and name of publisher from STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: print bleeding with considerable loss of text. B₁ and all after B₃ lacking?
Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.
